customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
Custom emoji - add large
————————————————————————————
1. Click on Main Menu > Custom Emoji > Add Custom Emoji
2. Enter an emoji name surrounded by colons (eg :emoji:)
3. Click "Select", and and choose a large image (more than 64KB or 128x128 pixels)
4. Save
5. Return to team, and type ":" followed by the emoji name
6. Post the emoji in the channel
7. Refresh the page
inline.expectedResult: Emoji saves and appears in emoji list. It appears in the emoji autocomplete when ":" and the name is typed. The image appears correctly when the emoji is posted to the channel. It still appears correctly after refresh.
